content: the lilith cardigan is the sweetest cardigan for spring and summer mindless and easy to crochet this cardigan has a beautiful feminine stitch pattern and a sweet bow tie front available as a free crochet pattern this cardigan comes in 7 sizes with plenty of photos throughout the pattern free crochet pattern https //stitchberryblog com/2024/07/22/easy-pretty-bow-cardigan-free-crochet-pattern/ ad-free pdf https //stitchberrypatterns etsy com/listing/1762318321
